channel.title: Android on xf
channel.description: Recent content in Android on xf

item.description: > adb root adb root adb remount adb shell

> Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 10in (3G) TWRP Installation Download Heimdall Link in resources Access TWRP Volume Up + Power + Home button Release for Samsung splash screen No MTP/OTG Access $ Connect USB $ adb push /dir/rom.zip /sdcard ROM Installation Try MTP/OTG or use adb Move ROM.zip to device storage (unzip not necessary) Install (or wipe then install) Wipe the cache afterwards (clears out the ROM) > Resources Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 10in (3G) https://forum.

> Lite Installation $ pkg install openssh libcurl curl $ bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://git.io/oh-my-termux)" $ termux-setup-storage > Community Repos $ curl -LO https://its-pointless.github.io/setup-pointless-repo.sh $ bash setup-pointless-repo.sh (frotz, etc.) > Change package mirrors (if syncing issues) $ termux-change-repo
